full_text: Knitted bow/Christmas decoration in DROPS Flora, DROPS Kid-Silk and DROPS Glitter. The piece is worked from side to side with garter stitch and I-cord. Theme: Christmas. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #dropsyuletideribbon DROPS Design: Pattern fl-097 Yarn group A + A or C SIZE: Length = 94 cm. Width = 11 cm. YARN : DROPS FLORA from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group A) 50 g colour 31, sand And use: DROPS KID-SILK from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group A) 25 g colour 56, marzipan And use: DROPS GLITTER from Garnstudio 2 spools colour 01, gold note that yardage above is calculated without Glitter as it doesn’t play on the tension NEEDLES : DROPS SINGLE POINTED NEEDLES SIZE 3.5 MM. KNITTING TENSION: 20 stitches in width and 40 rows in height, with needle size 3.5 mm = 10 x 10 cm. NOTE: Needle size is only a guide. If you get too many stitches on 10 cm, change to a larger needle size. If you get too few stitches on 10 cm, change to a smaller needle size.
